artist: Painter: After Willem van Mieris; Engraver: Jacob Houbraken
description: bust length portrait of man facing right looking back at viewer; wearing cloak and white stock and long curly wig; in an oval frame with sheild at top and putto at lower left; on a pedestal with books, medals at lower right; four lines in French below frame; lettered with sitter's name, age and date around oval
inscription:
Signature,Title, Date, and Inscription

around frame in black: GERARD VAN LOON ÆTAT XLIX.  MDCCXXX | in black on pedestal: four lines in French | below image on sheet: F. Van Mieris pinx   J. Houbraken sculp. | on sheet in pencil: 2-68
title: Portrait of Gerard van Loon
